<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><Highlight kind="normal">    CoverageFile-&gt;keep();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
